name: TLabBasketball_VR
description:
A simple basketball game. 

Playable in oculus quest.

Scores earned in Score Attack can also be registered in the ranking.

----- Method of operation -----

･ Button Two / Four : enable / disenable pointer

･ Button One / Three : click

･ ThumbStick : catch the ball

･ How to shoot : catch the ball and swing your arm in the direction you want it to fly
